title: Drawing, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Placement Plan", 1933
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions throughout Inscribed in red pencil with dimensions, instructions throughout
description: Floor plan in upper portion shows entrance on lower left wall. Red leather sofa, rectangular side table, and coffee table on left wall. Red upholstered chair, chair, and beige booth (?) in center of floor on left side of room. Small round side table between two chairs in upper center of room, to be done in white and polished metal. Right side of room has piano on upper wall, red leather chair below piano, and chair and cabinet (?) on right wall. Desk, two chairs, and lamp on lower wall to right. Large round table with table lamp on surface at lower right corner. Perspective drawing of table with table lamp below plan, and console table with glass top, curved sides in wood (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Placement Plan", 1933.
1933. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-282.
